content.rendered:
As a responsible corporate citizen, Lum Chang is committed to operating in an economically, socially and environmentally responsible manner for the long-term sustainability of our businesses, the environment and the community at large.

Our sustainability report is produced in accordance to the GRI standards “Core” option covering our Group’s performance. Incorporated in our annual report, Lum Chang’s Sustainability Report, in conjunction with the Corporate Governance Report provides details to the Group’s material Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) topics in our sustainability journey.

To read our current and past issues of our Sustainability Report from FY2018, please click here.
